name: Emble
description:
Emble is a 2D platformer where you solve puzzles, evade enemies, and maneuver obstacle-oriented levels, all with Emble by your side.

There will be times when Emble will make it more difficult to pass a level, and there will be times when it will be easier, but it is all part of the journey. You'll complete your own story, together

CONTROLS:

Resolution: 1600x900 
Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and SPACE to jump.
Press ESC in any level to return to select a new world.
